feat.title: Accidental Tells
feat.benefit: When you make an Insight check against a creature within the aura granted by your mantle of misfortune racial power, you can roll twice and take the better result.

feat.title: Ancient Covenant of Nessus
feat.benefit: When you use a divine encounter or daily attack power on your turn, instead of your normal covenant manifestation, you can allow one target of the power to make a basic attack as a free reaction.
If the target makes this attack, it takes fire damage equal to 5 + your Intelligence modifier after resolving the attack.
This fire damage increases to 10 + your Intelligence modifier at 11th level, and to 15 + your Intelligence modifier at 21st level.

feat.title: Avernian Emissary Wrath
feat.benefit: Once per encounter, when you miss a target that has your shrouds on it, you can use your infernal wrath racial power against it.
This does not expend infernal wrath and can be done even if it is expended.

feat.title: Baalzebul's Desperate Gambit
feat.benefit: When you first become bloodied in an encounter, you can roll a saving throw with a bonus equal to the number of enemies adjacent to you.
If you succeed, you can spend a healing surge to regain hit points equal to your healing surge value. If you fail, you lose a healing surge.

feat.title: Bael Turath Ancestry
feat.benefit: Your racial fire resistance increases to 5 + your level.

feat.title: Bel's Impending Victory
feat.benefit: When you hit a bloodied enemy, your allies gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls against that target until the start of your next turn or until the enemy is no longer bloodied, whichever comes first.

feat.title: Benefit of Foresight
feat.benefit: When you make an Intimidate check against a creature you can see, you can roll twice and take either result.

feat.title: Blood Pact of Cania
feat.benefit: You gain a +1 bonus to damage rolls with gift of Avernus, hellish rebuke, and any Warlock power that has additional benefits for Infernal Pact.
The bonus damage increases to +2 at 11th level, and to +3 at 21st level.

feat.title: Blood Quarry
feat.benefit: The bonus to attack rolls from your Bloodhunt racial trait increases to +2 against your quarry.

feat.title: Blood of Levistus
feat.benefit: You gain resist cold equal to 5 + one-half your level.
Also, you gain a +3 feat bonus to damage rolls with Cold powers.
This bonus to damage rolls increases to +4 at 21st level.

feat.title: Bloodhunter's Dread
feat.benefit: When you hit a bloodied foe, the target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls against you until the end of your next turn.

feat.title: Bloodhunter's Flank
feat.benefit: When you flank a bloodied foe, you and allies you flank with gain a +2 bonus to damage rolls against that foe.
This damage bonus increases to +3 at 11th level, and to +4 at 21st level.

feat.title: Bloodseeker
feat.benefit: You gain a +3 bonus to damage rolls against bloodied enemies with enforce challenge.
Starting at 11th level, you gain a +1 bonus to damage rolls against bloodied enemies marked by you. This stacks with the bonus above.
These bonuses increase to +5 and +2 at 21st level, respectively.

feat.title: Burning Wrath of Phlegethos
feat.benefit: If you use your infernal wrath racial power against your oath target, your melee attacks against that target deal additioal fire damage equal to your Intelligence modifier until the end of your next turn.
The additional damage increases to 2 + your Intelligence modifier at 11th level, and to 4 + your Intelligence modifier at 21st level.

feat.title: Clever Tail
feat.benefit: Once per round as a free action, you can draw or stow an object weighing 1 pound or less with your tail.

You can use your tail to make Thievery checks, including using thieves' tools, even without using your hands. If you have your hands and tail available when making a Thievery check, you gain a +2 bonus to the check.
This feat does not give you the ability to make attacks with your tail.

feat.title: Cloying Darkness of Maladomini
feat.benefit: When an enemy hits you with a melee attack while you have concealment granted by your Shadow Walk, you gain combat advantage against that enemy until the end of your next turn.

feat.title: Cunning Wrath
feat.benefit: If you have combat advantage against the target of your infernal wrath racial power, you deal additional damage equal to your Dexterity modifier.
This additional damage increases to 3 + your Dexterity modifier at 11th level, and to 6 + your Dexterity modifier at 21st level.

feat.title: Diabolic Soul
feat.benefit: Whenever a creature scores a critical hit against you, you gain a +2 bonus to attack rolls against that creature until the end of the encounter.
Also, you replace your infernal wrath racial power with the diabolic transformation racial power.

power.title: Diabolic Transformation
power.fluff: You roar with infernal fury as the hellish blood that flows through your veins reveals its true power in the blink of an eye, transforming you into a brutish fiend

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You transform into a diabolic brute until the end of the encounter.
While you are in this form, you gain the following benefits:
► Your fire resistance increases by 5.
► The bonus to attack rolls from your Bloodhunt racial trait increases to +2.
► You gain a +2 power bonus to damage rolls.

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: +3 power bonus.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: +4 power bonus.
► You gain regeneration 2, or regeneration 3 if you were bloodied when you used this power.

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: Regeneration 4 or regeneration 6.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: Regeneration 6 or regeneration 10.
While you are in this form, you can use the Black Wrath of Hell attack once.

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You hit an enemy with an attack

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The triggering enemy takes an additional +1d6 damage from the triggering attack, and also takes a penalty to all attack rolls against you (save ends). The penalty equals your Intelligence modifier or your Charisma modifier.

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: Additional +2d6 damage.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: Additional +3d6 damage.

feat.title: Dispater's Iron Discipline
feat.benefit: You gain a +2 feat bonus to Will defense.
Also, you gain a +4 feat bonus to saving throws against conditions and effects that stun, dominate or daze you.

feat.title: Eldritch Fire
feat.benefit: When you use your eldritch blast or eldritch strike class power, you can choose for it to deal fire damage. If you do, it gains the Fire keyword and gains a +1 bonus to the damage roll.
The bonus to damage increases to +2 at 11th level, and to +3 at 21st level.

feat.title: Fiendish Companion
feat.benefit: Your beast companion has the same fire resistance that you have, not counting temporary increases.

feat.title: Fiendish Warrior
feat.benefit: Your infernal wrath racial power can also be triggered by an enemy marked by you hitting an ally with an attack that doesn't include you as a target.

feat.title: Fiery Rebuke
feat.benefit: Your infernal wrath racial power deals 4 additional damage.
The additional damage increases to 8 at 21st level.

feat.title: Foulborn Heritage
feat.benefit: You are a foulborn.
Your origin changes to aberrant instead of natural.
Also, you have the unbalanced mind power.

power.title: Unbalanced Mind
power.fluff: Your connection to the Far Realm unleashes psychic pain in response to attack

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You take damage

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of your next turn, you have an Aura 1 (Psionic, Psychic).
Any creature that enters the aura or ends its turn there takes 5 psychic damage. A creature can take this damage only once per turn.

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: 10 psychic damage.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: 15 psychic damage.

feat.title: Furious Demand
feat.benefit: You gain a +2 feat bonus to Intimidate checks.
Also, you replace an utility power of 2nd level or higher with the furious demand power.

power.title: Furious Demand
power.fluff: Your soul burns with anger, causing your foe to quail in fear at the expression on your face

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You succeed on an Intimidate check or hit with an attack

section.name: Target:
section.text: The creature you intimidated or hit

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target takes a penalty to attack rolls against you (save ends). The penalty equals 1 + one-half your Charisma modifier (minimum -2 penalty).

section.name: Aftereffect:
section.text: The target takes a penalty to attack rolls against you until the end of its next turn. The penalty equals one-half your Charisma modifier (minimum -1 penalty).
Also, you gain a +2 bonus to all Intimidate checks until the end of the encounter.

feat.title: Gaze of Ruin
feat.benefit: You gain a +2 bonus to Insight checks and Perception checks you make against other tieflings.
Also, you gain the gaze of ruin racial power.

power.title: Gaze of Ruin
power.fluff: Your gaze causes foodstuff to become inedible, a wooden door to rot, armor to grow brittle, or a weapon to rust

section.name: Target:
section.text: One object

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target gains vulnerable to all damage until the end of your next turn. The vulnerable equals one-half your level + your Intelligence modifier.
If the target is a weapon, attacks with it take a penalty to damage rolls equal to your Intelligence modifier (minimum -1 penalty) while it has this vulnerable.

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: Equal to 3 + your Intelligence modifier (minimum -4 penalty).

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: Equal to 6 + your Intelligence modifier (minimum -7 penalty).
If the target is armor, a creature wearing it takes a -2 penalty to AC while it has this vulnerable.

feat.title: Glasya's Charming Words
feat.benefit: You gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls with powers that have the Charm keyword.
Also, when you score a critical hit with a Charm power, the target is also dominated until the end of your next turn.

feat.title: Guardian's Mishaps
feat.benefit: When you slide a creature in the aura granted by your mantle of misfortune racial power, you can mark that creature until the end of its next turn.

feat.title: Hell's Burning Mark
feat.benefit: While a creature is marked by you, it has vulnerable 5 fire against your attacks.

feat.title: Hellbook
feat.benefit: Each time you finish an extended rest and prepare your Wizard spells, choose one encounter attack or daily attack power with either the Fear or Fire keyword from your spellbook.

As a minor action, you replace one Wizard attack power of the same kind and of the same level or higher with the chosen power. If you replace an encounter attack power, the next time you take a rest, you regain the original power.

feat.title: Hellfire Arcanist
feat.benefit: When you push, pull, or slide a creature with a Fear power, increase that forced movement by 2 squares.
Also, you gain a +2 feat bonus to damage rolls with Fire attacks.
This bonus to damage increases to +3 at 11th level, and to +4 at 21st level.

feat.title: Hellfire Blood
feat.benefit: You gain a +1 feat bonus to attack rolls with Fear and Fire powers.

feat.title: Hellfire Master
feat.benefit: When an enemy saves against an effect bestowed by your Fire attack, it takes fire damage equal to 5 + your Charisma modifier.
This damage increases to 7 + your Charisma modifier at 11th level, and to 10 + your Charisma modifier at 21st level.

feat.title: Hellfire Teleport
feat.benefit: Once per turn, when you teleport, you deal fire damage to each enemy in or adjacent to the space you leave. The fire damage equals 10 + your Intelligence modifier or Charisma modifier.

feat.title: Hellfire of Mephistopheles
feat.benefit: Each time you hit an enemy that has resist fire with a Fire attack, after the attack has been resolved, the resist fire is reduced by 5 until the end of the encounter.

feat.title: Hellish Defiance
feat.benefit: When you use your infernal wrath racial power, the target provokes opportunity attacks from your allies when it attacks you. This effect lasts until the end of its next turn.

feat.title: Hellish Terror Lord
feat.benefit: When an enemy successfully saves against an effect bestowed by your Fear power, it falls prone.

feat.title: Hellmind Scorn
feat.benefit: When an enemy successfully saves against a Psychic effect bestowed by you, you can use a free reaction to slide that enemy 1 square and make it gain vulnerable 5 psychic until the end of your next turn.
Starting at 11th level, the vulnerable increases to 7.
Starting at 21st level, you can slide the enemy up to 2 squares, and the vulnerable increases to 10.

feat.title: Icy Clutch of Stygia
feat.benefit: Whenever an enemy successfully saves against ongoing damage that you imposed, that enemy takes cold damage equal to your Intelligence modifier or your Charisma modifier.
This cold damage increases to 5 + your Intelligence modifier or your Charisma modifier at 11th level, and to 10 + your Intelligence modifier or your Charisma modifier at 21st level.

feat.title: Imperious Majesty
feat.benefit: You can use your Charisma instead of Dexterity to determine your Initiative modifier.

Also, when you hit a creature that has not yet acted in an encounter with an attack, it takes a penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn. The penalty equals one-half your Charisma modifier.

feat.title: Infernal Blessing
feat.benefit: When you use your infernal wrath racial power, one ally adjacent to you regains hit points equal to your Charisma modifier and gains a +1 power bonus to his or her first attack roll against the target of the power before the end of his or her next turn. This is a Divine, Healing effect.
The number of hit points regained increases to 3 + your Charisma modifier at 11th level, and to 6 + your Charisma modifier at 21st level.

feat.title: Infernal Clamor
feat.benefit: When you use your infernal wrath racial power, each of your allies who can see you gains a +1 power bonus to his or her first attack roll against the triggering enemy before the end of that enemy's next turn.

feat.title: Infernal Malediction
feat.benefit: When you use your infernal wrath racial power, you can choose for all attack you make until the end of your next turn to gain the Fear keyword.

feat.title: Infernal Might
feat.benefit: When you use your infernal wrath racial power, if the next attack you make is a basic attack or a Martial, Weapon power, it deals +1[W] extra damage.
The extra damage increases to +2[W] at 11th level, and to +3[W] at 21st level.

feat.title: Infernal Rebuke
feat.benefit: When you use your infernal wrath racial power, you can push the target 1 square.

feat.title: Infernal Sneak Attack
feat.benefit: When you deal your Sneak Attack damage, you can choose to expend your infernal wrath racial power as a free interrupt.
If you do, you apply the effects of your infernal wrath racial power as part of the sneak attack, and all of the sneak attack damage is fire damage.

feat.title: Infernal Touch of Warding
feat.benefit: When you use your lay on hands or touch of virtue class power, the target also gains resist fire equal to 5 + one-half your level until the end of the encounter.

feat.title: Infernal Warrior
feat.benefit: When an enemy scores a critical hit against you, you can use your infernal wrath racial power against that enemy as a free reaction without expending the power, and even if it is already expended.

feat.title: Insatiable Rage of Minauros
feat.benefit: While you are raging, you gain a +2 bonus to melee damage rolls, but if you end your turn without dealing damage to an enemy on that turn, you take 2 damage.
The bonus to damage and the damage you take increase to +3 and 3 at 11th level, and to +5 and 5 at 21st level, respectively.

feat.title: Lasting Decay
feat.benefit: When you use your gaze of ruin racial power, the target's vulnerable all lasts until the end of the encounter or until you no longer see the target, whichever comes first.

feat.title: Lingering Wrath
feat.benefit: When you use your infernal wrath racial power against an enemy marked by you, you gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls against that enemy until it is no longer marked by you.

feat.title: Lucky Misfortune
feat.benefit: When you slide a creature in the aura granted by your mantle of misfortune racial power, you gain a +2 bonus to the first attack roll or skill check you make before the end of your next turn.

feat.title: Mammon's Theft of Health
feat.benefit: When you use your second wind, you can choose an ally within 5 squares of you.
If you do, the chosen ally loses one healing surge, and you regain additional hit points equal to your healing surge value.

feat.title: Mantle of Misfortune
feat.benefit: You gain a +2 bonus to Insight checks and Perception checks made against other tieflings.
Also, you gain the mantle of misfortune power as a racial power.

power.title: Mantle of Misfortune
power.fluff: While the enemy remains near you, its feet slip, it drops things, and nothing goes right

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You activate an Aura 1 (Arcane) that lasts until the end of your next turn.
Enemies in the aura take a -2 penalty to attack rolls. Whenever an enemy in the aura misses with an attack, you can slide that enemy 1 square as a free reaction.

feat.title: Mark of the Infernal
feat.benefit: The target of your infernal wrath racial power is also subject to your Divine Sanction until the start of its next turn.

feat.title: Nession Rejuvenation
feat.benefit: When an ally gains temporary hit points from your Arcane Rejuvenation class feature, his or her next attack roll before the end of his or her next turn deals additional fire damage. The fire damage equals your Charisma modifier if the ally used an item's daily power, or half this amount in case of an item's encounter power.
The additional fire damage for a daily power increases to 2 + your Charisma modifier at 11th level, and to 5 + your Charisma modifier at 21st level.

feat.title: Plaguing Bloodhunt
feat.benefit: When you hit a bloodied enemy, that enemy also takes 3 necrotic damage. This is a separate source of damage.
This necrotic damage increases to 6 at 11th level, and to 10 at 21st level.
If you have the Student of the Plague feat, the damage is fire and necrotic instead.

feat.title: Wrath of the Crimson Legion
feat.benefit: When you make a melee basic attack, you can use your Charisma modifier instead of your Strength modifier for the attack roll and the damage roll.
Also, you can choose to replace your infernal wrath racial power with the paladin's wrath racial power.

power.title: Paladin's Wrath
power.fluff: You stand against your foes, unleashing a howling battle cry that seems to howl from the depths of Hell

section.name: Target:
section.text: Each enemy in the burst

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target is subject to your Divine Sanction until the end of your next turn.

feat.title: Wrathful Hunter
feat.benefit: If you use your infernal wrath racial power against your quarry, you gain a +3 power bonus to attack rolls against the target for the first attack you make against it before the end of your next turn.

feat.title: Wrathful Magic
feat.benefit: You can use your infernal wrath racial power with the following trigger instead of the usual one:
Trigger: You miss a creature within 10 squares with an arcane attack power
